Grading Criteria for Written Assignments

Written Assignment Rubric
Criteria Performance Quality Score
0 points 1 point 2 points 3 points
Written Assignments Assignment was not submitted on time, is poorly written, does not contain content relevant to the course, or does not meet the post length requirement. Assignment was published on time, contains some spelling and/or grammatical errors, meets the post length requirement, but content is not very relevant to the course, or does not expand upon course topics. Assignment was published on time, contains no spelling and/or grammatical errors, meets the post length requirement, and the content expands upon course topics. Assignment is published on time, is very well written with no typos, grammar, or spelling errors, expands upon course topics, and exceeds the minimum post length. Post contains images where relevant to the content, and links to plenty of sources and resources.
